posts.author: Orlouge
posts.content: Recently purchased the game and seems rakshasa is no longer able to empower/maximise/etc. those ice storms! Is this EE related or is it something else?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I'm fairly sure I've read about this somewhere else and believe it's an EE "refinement". I can't promise, though.

Cheers
